breadCrumbs.text: How will you build 1-stage further competition

title: How will you build 1-stage further competition?
subtitle1: The information you enter into this service will create a bid pack that is shared with the suppliers so they can ge t abetter understanding of your needs and how they can meet them.
subtitle2: You can either enter all the information online,or you can upload documents with your requirements and/or evaluation details

form.question: How would you like to include your requirements document (attachment 3)?

hint.text: Enter all the information needed to build your one stage further competition online and submit it to your selected suppliers.

items.text: Upload only your statement of requirements but finish the bid pack online (Coming soon)

hint.text: Use this option to upload attachement and complete the assessment online.

form.question: How would you like to include your evaluation document (attachment 2)?

hint.text: Enter all the information needed to build your one stage further competition online and submit it to your selected suppliers.

items.text: Upload only your statement of requirements but finish the bid pack online (Coming soon)

hint.text: Use this option to upload attachement and complete the assessment online.
